amendment.description: To require reports on the service life and replacement of AC-130 gunships of the Air Force.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1746 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1746 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S8005-8017; text: CR S8011) To require reports on the service life and replacement of AC-130 gunships of the Air Force.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1746 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Bingaman.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1746 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
